definition: A person who has recently become a customer or client of a business, typically referring to someone who has recently started using a product or service.

examples.german: Als Neukunde erhalten Sie einen Rabatt.
examples.english: As a new customer, you will receive a discount.

examples.german: Wir bieten spezielle Angebote für Neukunden an.
examples.english: We offer special deals for new customers.
New customers benefit from exclusive advantages.

examples.german: Als Neukunde können Sie sich registrieren und bestellen.
examples.english: As a new customer, you can register and place an order.
